group_1.narration: Those were nightmares.
Terrible dreams of losing loved ones.
But Ui is here, and so is everyone at Mikazuki Villa,@and all of us are living happily, without any worries.
In this place, there is nothing to fear.
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][se:4050_landing_jump]I was creating a world of happiness for myself@to make the terrifying nightmare of losing everyone else go away.
Even though I was immersed in this dream,@somewhere deep down, I knew that this world wasn't real.
I was aware of it,@but I pretended not to notice.
...but Yachiyo's voice woke me up,@telling me I couldn't go on like this.
I meant to save Yachiyo, but in the end,@it was her who saved me again.
Moreover, I realized how much I worried Yachiyo@and how much pain I caused her.
And so, I made up my mind.
I'm going to find Ui, get everyone back at Mikazuki Villa,@and take happiness into my own hands.
As long as I cherish everyone,@I have nothing to be afraid of.
and I'm far, far more afraid of losing them.
And so we arrived at Hotel Fenthope to search for the others,@where we learned about the real dangers of Doppels
and that the Wings of Magius are trying to gather Witches@and summon the calamity that is Walpurgis Night.
As her big sister figure,@I can't allow Touka to do such a dangerous thing.
That's why I decided that I would make sure@to bring back Touka and Nemu and teach them a lesson.
In our fight against the Wings of Magius,@we met Madoka and other Magical Girls@from Mitakihara City who were looking for their friends just like us.
But just as I was about to join forces@with Madoka and the others to find everyone...
What we found was that Tsuruno had been transformed@after being fused with a Rumor.
To save her, there was only one way.
The only way to do this was to imagine@exactly what Tsuruno's personality was like and attack@with the intention of Connecting with her,
so Yachiyo, who has known her the longest,@was the one to make the Connect.
I'm sure that at that time,@both Yachiyo and I had the same image of Tsuruno@with a big smile on her face.
"I want Tsuruno to return to her cheerful, sunny self"...@That's what I was praying at that moment.
...But, we failed.
Because we failed to notice@the sadness beneath Tsuruno's smile.
I thought we were friends.@I thought we were family.
I was so disappointed in myself,@and the fact that I didn't know anything about it,@that I felt like I was unworthy of her.
In the end,@I was still clueless about it all.
